message: Take it or leave it, Bob!
Let's split it evenly, Alice. It's a fair deal for both of us.
You're not getting the better deal, Bob!
I'm willing to compromise, Alice. Let's split it 60/40, with me getting the larger share this time.
Last chance, Bob. Take it or walk away!
Alice, we're getting close to the end. Let's be reasonable and split it 70/30 this time. It's better than nothing!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
Alice, we're running out of time. I'm willing to give you 20% this time, but we need to agree quickly. This is my last offer.
Last stand, Bob. We're splitting it down the middle. Take it!
